title: Dragon Quest VII
summary: Dragon Quest VII: Fragments of the Forgotten Past[lower-alpha 1] is a Japanese role-playing video game developed by Heartbeat[4] and ArtePiazza,[5] and published by Enix for the PlayStation in 2000. It was released in North America in 2001 under the title Dragon Warrior VII. The game received a remake on the Nintendo 3DS on February 7, 2013 in Japan, which was released in North America and Europe for the Nintendo 3DS under the title Dragon Quest VII: Fragments of the Forgotten Past in 2016. A version of the game for Android and iOS was also released in Japan on September 17, 2015.[6][7]
